de.tum.in.tumcampus.auxiliary

Class HTMLStringBuffer

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.tum.in.tumcampus.auxiliary.HTMLStringBuffer

  • public class HTMLStringBuffer
extends java.lang.Object
    StringBuffer wrapper class to format text in a customized way.

      HTMLStringBuffer()
      Creates a new buffer.

        public void appendField(java.lang.String label,
               java.lang.String content)
        Append a new label-content pair to the text. Format label as being bold.
        Parameters:
        label - The label labeling the content.
        content - The content labeled by the label.
